item.title: First post
item.description: Why I made this website First of all, I didn’t make this website. It’s a fork of the relatively popular hugo-monochrome theme that I’m hacking on. It’s a really well designed theme that has all the features I need for a simple blog/projects/misc website. I’m hosting it on Github Pages because it’s free and convenient. I’m not planning on making posts daily, weekly or even monthly. This website is for writing down my thoughts, posting interesting stuff that I learned and maybe cringy attempts at trying to teach people how to do various stuff.
